The Religion Humanity Initiative

Mission Statement

Uniting humans as one by bringing an end to injustice, religious violence, sectarian violence, provincialism, social inequality and corruption.

The Religion Humanity Initiative is working to bring the change that is much needed in this era chaos. Now maybe many of you might be sitting in a cozy bed or so but there are hundreds of people dying and being hurt on the basis of religion. Religion is meant to bring peace, yet instead- It has done much damage to the foundation of humanity. Between Wars and Injustice the prevalent evil has fed many at times on the name of religion. So for us, let us end this evil and bring humanity as a religion because you may be a Catholic, Protestant, Jew, Hindu, Shia, Sunni or Buddhist but before that you are a human because the essence of every religion is humanity. We believe that although every person has absolute right to practice whatever his/her religion is but comitting crimes on the name of this is absolutely unacceptable. We are working to ensure that the youth is not adversly affected by any such influencing factors and remains what is should be; HUMAN. Thereafter, let us work to finish enmity based on religion and bring humanity and brotherhood back to life.

Let Us Bring The Change!
